metadata.title: CVE-2016-1924 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
The opj_tgt_reset function in OpenJpeg 2016.1.18 allows remote attackers tocause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read and application crash) via acrafted JPEG 2000 image.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-1924` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libopenjp2-7 - 2.1.1-1
libopenjp2-tools - 2.1.1-1
libopenjp3d-tools - 2.1.1-1
libopenjp3d7 - 2.1.1-1
libopenjpip-dec-server - 2.1.1-1
libopenjpip-server - 2.1.1-1
libopenjpip-viewer - 2.1.1-1
libopenjpip7 - 2.1.1-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: openjpeg2 package in esm-apps/bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.1.1-1').
